name: TransLoc Android Widget
tagline: Android widget application for TransLoc bus tracking
body:
# TransLoc Android Widget

Standalone Android widget application for TransLoc bus tracking.

Uses [TransLoc OpenAPI](api.transloc.com)

***

[Available for Android on Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.shyamu.translocwidget)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
